com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.document_conversion.v1.helpers
Class BatchHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.document_conversion.v1.helpers.BatchHelper

public class BatchHelper
extends Object

Helper for the batch API calls NOTE: The methods in this class should not be called directly! Please make all calls to the service using the DocumentConversion class.

See Also:
DocumentConversion

See Also:
DocumentConversion.createBatch(String, List)

getBatchCollection

public BatchCollection getBatchCollection(Map<String,Object> batchListParams)
Gets a collection of all existing batches with optional query parameters for filtering results. GET /v1/batches

Parameters:
batchListParams - The parameters to be used in the batch list service call. The parameters - token, limit, name and since are optional
  • String token - The reference to the starting element of the requested page which is provided by the server, pass null to get the first page
  • int limit - The number of batches to get, pass 0 to use the default limit from server (100)
  • String name - The name of batches to get, pass null to exclude this filter
  • Date since - The date to filter on, batches created on or after the provided date and time format will be returned, pass null to exclude this filter
Returns:
Batches based on filtering parameters provided
See Also:
DocumentConversion.getBatchCollection(Map)
